Reviews.Content: Clean, well run hotel       Clean bathroom
Reviews.Author: Teaspoony

Reviews.Content: I'm glad I chose this hotel.       The front part of the hotel.
Reviews.Author: sms129b

Reviews.Content: Good experience Very near to the ikebukuro station once you get the exit right. Good alternative stay to Shinjuku for the location and price. Next door is a 99Yen convenience shop, nice free coffee in the small hotel lobby. Staff understands English, rooms very clean (typical of all Japanese hotels) /good size. Non-smoking rooms didnt smell of cigarette smoke unlike some other business hotels.
Reviews.Author: SingaporeWoodbury

Reviews.Content: Hotel basico de negocios bien situado.   showReview(11265741, 'full');
Reviews.Author: Nacsa
